name: Duel Shootout
description:
A 2 Player Game.

Shoot your opponent to score a point. First to 7 (points) wins.

CONTROLS - 2 Controllers OR 1 Keyboard (Controllers recommended)

Controller (Xbox 360/One controllers tested)

ActionAMoveLeft StickAimRight StickFireRight Trigger

Keyboard

Player 1Player 2 (Numpad ON)ActionEnterEnterMoveWASDNumpad [8] [4] [5] [6]AimQ & ENumpad [7] & Numpad [9]FireFNumpad [1]
